data.name: Playback Trauma®: The Beach
data.detailed_description:
Try Something A Little Less Horrific

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1296550/Altidudes/?utm_source=trauma_cross_promo


About the Game

Playback Trauma: The Beach is a 5-15 minute found-footage horror game set on the beach at night.

Explore and learn more about those who came before you. Make your way to the shoreline where something waits beyond the clouds.

Features:

Gameplay: Primarily a "Walking Simulator" with a heavy focus on exploration and story.

Explore: Discover remnants of something that is corrupting the area, and find the shore.

Immersive graphics: Realistic art all seen through the lens of your trusted camcorder.

Setting: The game world is inspired by a real beachside town in New Jersey, and is just as terrifying.

Psychological Horror: Navigate the sights and sounds of the beach without approaching your wits end.

data.short_description: After a long and harrowing day, you have come to the beach to unwind. Something is different about tonight though. It's just the beach, there's nothing out there. Right?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz, 3401 Mhz, 4 Core(s), 8 Logical Processor(s)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 3GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS x 10.9
  • Processor: i7 - 4 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Amd Radeon Pro 560 or R9 M295X
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood and implied death
